summary: A results driven Controls Engineer and Project Manager with over 20 years of experience in manufacturing. Skilled in Industrial Automation and Process Engineering with a strong mechanical design background. Proven ability to lead and motivate high performance teams. History of building systems with improved functionality and productivity, consistently meeting critical requirements.

experience.title: Engineering Services Manager
experience.description: Maintained the efficiency and effectiveness of production manufacturing processes to ensure quality, repeatability, and cost effectiveness. Managed engineering services, energy provisioning, and resources. Oversaw mechanical repairs and design within departments. Supported wastewater operations with advanced Siemens PLC troubleshooting and WINCC SCADA configuration. Ensured expenditures stayed within budget and developed asset management software to track costs and work orders. Performed PLC support for plant equipment.

experience.title: Electrical Superintendent
experience.description: Supervised electrical and instrumentation activities; ensured proper operation of automation and controls on production equipment, power distribution, plant communications, and security systems. Managed design-to-startup installation projects (> $1M). Directed large Allen-Bradley PLC networks (ControLogix, CompactLogix) with FactoryTalk View ME/SE. Trained electricians and instrument technicians in advanced troubleshooting and PLC programming; maintained NFPA 70E and NEC compliance.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Reviewed designs and specifications for suitability and initiated revisions. Led a team of 5 engineers in machine section design to ensure on-time project completion. Supervised mechanical and electrical assembly, coordinated with vendors and contractors, and managed project budgets, contracts, and quality controls for on-time installations.

experience.title: Facility Supervisor
experience.description: Managed 6 maintenance personnel. Oversaw construction of new buildings and facility alterations. Performed troubleshooting and repairs on production equipment (hydraulic presses, autoclaves, etc.) and designed/installed industrial automation for production equipment. PLC and HMI programming primarily on the Allen-Bradley SLC500 platform.

experience.title: Maintenance Manager/Safety & Environmental Manager
experience.description: Led plant maintenance and engineering personnel; ensured compliance with federal, state, and local regulations. Managed electrical and mechanical systems, HVAC, pumps, piping, fire protection, and building safety; implemented maintenance programs and inventory management. Oversaw environmental health and safety programs and permits. Installed, programmed, and operated material handling control systems; created custom databases and production/accounting programs; migrated from Modicon to Allen-Bradley PLC with Wonderware HMI; trained maintenance staff.

experience.title: Maintenance Technician
experience.description: Performed routine electrical and mechanical maintenance and emergency repairs on automated PLC-controlled conveyors and other equipment. Updated PLC logic and maintained revision history.

experience.title: Electrician
experience.description: Repaired and maintained plastic extrusion equipment; troubleshooting of PLCs, AC/DC drives, motors, and control equipment. Maintained plant utilities and implemented a CMMS to track maintenance resources and costs. Trained staff in PLC programming and troubleshooting.

experience.title: Microwave Communications Technician
experience.description: Rebuilt and overhauled microwave communications equipment; repaired UHF and VHF radios. Created computerized inventory control to streamline quarterly inventories.
